00028 static void setAntialiasing(QPainter *painter, bool on)
00029 {
00030     QPaintEngine *engine = painter->paintEngine();
00031     if ( engine && engine->hasFeature(QPaintEngine::Antialiasing) )
00032         painter->setRenderHint(QPainter::Antialiasing, on);
00033 }
00034 #else
00035 static void setAntialiasing(QPainter *, bool)
00036 {
00037 }
00038 #endif

00040 class QwtDial::PrivateData
00041 {
00042 public:
00043     PrivateData():
00044         visibleBackground(true),
00045         frameShadow(Sunken),
00046         lineWidth(0),
00047         mode(RotateNeedle),
00048         origin(90.0),
00049         minScaleArc(0.0),
00050         maxScaleArc(0.0),
00051         scaleDraw(0),
00052         maxMajIntv(36),
00053         maxMinIntv(10),
00054         scaleStep(0.0),
00055         needle(0)
00056     {
00057     }
00058 
00059     ~PrivateData()
00060     {
00061         delete scaleDraw;
00062         delete needle;
00063     }
00064     bool visibleBackground;
00065     Shadow frameShadow;
00066     int lineWidth;
00067 
00068     QwtDial::Mode mode;
00069 
00070     double origin;
00071     double minScaleArc;
00072     double maxScaleArc;
00073 
00074     QwtDialScaleDraw *scaleDraw;
00075     int maxMajIntv;
00076     int maxMinIntv;
00077     double scaleStep;
00078 
00079     QwtDialNeedle *needle;
00080 
00081     static double previousDir;
00082 };

00168 void QwtDial::initDial()
00169 {
00170     d_data = new PrivateData;
00171 
00172 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00173     setWFlags(Qt::WNoAutoErase);
00174 #endif 
00175 
00176 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00177     using namespace Qt;
00178 #endif
00179     setFocusPolicy(TabFocus);
00180 
00181     QPalette p = palette();
00182     for ( int i = 0; i < QPalette::NColorGroups; i++ )
00183     {
00184         const QPalette::ColorGroup cg = (QPalette::ColorGroup)i;
00185 
00186         // Base: background color of the circle inside the frame.
00187         // Foreground: background color of the circle inside the scale
00188 
00189 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00190         p.setColor(cg, QColorGroup::Foreground, 
00191             p.color(cg, QColorGroup::Base));
00192 #else
00193         p.setColor(cg, QPalette::Foreground, 
00194             p.color(cg, QPalette::Base));
00195 #endif
00196     }
00197     setPalette(p);
00198 
00199     d_data->scaleDraw = new QwtDialScaleDraw(this);
00200     d_data->scaleDraw->setRadius(0);
00201 
00202     setScaleArc(0.0, 360.0); // scale as a full circle
00203     setRange(0.0, 360.0, 1.0, 10); // degrees as deafult
00204 }

00270 void QwtDial::setLineWidth(int lineWidth)

00273         lineWidth = 0;

00296 QRect QwtDial::contentsRect() const
00297 {
00298     const int lw = lineWidth();
00299 
00300     QRect r = boundingRect();
00301     if ( lw > 0 )
00302     {
00303         r.setRect(r.x() + lw, r.y() + lw, 
00304             r.width() - 2 * lw, r.height() - 2 * lw);
00305     }
00306     return r;
00307 }
00308 
00313 QRect QwtDial::boundingRect() const
00314 {
00315     const int radius = qwtMin(width(), height()) / 2;
00316 
00317     QRect r(0, 0, 2 * radius, 2 * radius);
00318     r.moveCenter(rect().center());
00319     return r;
00320 }
00321 
00326 QRect QwtDial::scaleContentsRect() const
00327 {
00328 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00329     const QPen scalePen(colorGroup().text(), 0, Qt::NoPen);
00330 #else
00331     const QPen scalePen(palette().text(), 0, Qt::NoPen);
00332 #endif
00333 
00334     int scaleDist = 0;
00335     if ( d_data->scaleDraw )
00336     {
00337         scaleDist = d_data->scaleDraw->extent(scalePen, font());
00338         scaleDist++; // margin
00339     }
00340 
00341     const QRect rect = contentsRect();
00342     return QRect(rect.x() + scaleDist, rect.y() + scaleDist,
00343         rect.width() - 2 * scaleDist, rect.height() - 2 * scaleDist);
00344 }

00425 
00427 void QwtDial::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *e)
00428 {
00429     const QRect &ur = e->rect();
00430     if ( ur.isValid() )
00431     {
00432 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00433         QwtPaintBuffer paintBuffer(this, ur);
00434         QPainter &painter = *paintBuffer.painter();
00435 #else
00436         QPainter painter(this);
00437 #endif
00438 
00439         setAntialiasing(&painter, true);
00440 
00441         painter.save();
00442         drawContents(&painter);
00443         painter.restore();
00444 
00445         painter.save();
00446         drawFrame(&painter);
00447         painter.restore();
00448 
00449         if ( hasFocus() )
00450             drawFocusIndicator(&painter);
00451     }
00452 }
00453 
00459 void QwtDial::drawFocusIndicator(QPainter *painter) const
00460 {
00461     if ( !isReadOnly() )
00462     {
00463         QRect focusRect = contentsRect();
00464 
00465         const int margin = 2;
00466         focusRect.setRect( 
00467             focusRect.x() + margin,
00468             focusRect.y() + margin,
00469             focusRect.width() - 2 * margin,
00470             focusRect.height() - 2 * margin);
00471 
00472 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00473         QColor color = colorGroup().color(QColorGroup::Base);
00474 #else
00475         QColor color = palette().color(QPalette::Base);
00476 #endif
00477         if (color.isValid())
00478         {
00479             const QColor gray(Qt::gray);
00480 
00481             int h, s, v;
00482 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00483             color.hsv(&h, &s, &v);
00484 #else
00485             color.getHsv(&h, &s, &v);
00486 #endif
00487             color = (v > 128) ? gray.dark(120) : gray.light(120);
00488         }
00489         else
00490             color = Qt::darkGray;
00491 
00492         painter->save();
00493         painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
00494         painter->setPen(QPen(color, 0, Qt::DotLine));
00495         painter->drawEllipse(focusRect);
00496         painter->restore();
00497     }
00498 }
00499 
00506 void QwtDial::drawFrame(QPainter *painter)
00507 {
00508     const int lw = lineWidth();
00509     const int off = (lw + 1) % 2;
00510 
00511     QRect r = boundingRect();
00512     r.setRect(r.x() + lw / 2 - off, r.y() + lw / 2 - off,
00513         r.width() - lw + off + 1, r.height() - lw + off + 1);
00514 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00515 #ifdef __GNUC__
00516 #warning QwtPainter::drawRoundFrame 
00517 #endif
00518     r.setX(r.x() + 1);
00519     r.setY(r.y() + 1);
00520     r.setWidth(r.width() - 2);
00521     r.setHeight(r.height() - 2);
00522 #endif
00523 
00524     if ( lw > 0 )
00525     {
00526         switch(d_data->frameShadow)
00527         {
00528             case QwtDial::Raised:
00529 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00530                 QwtPainter::drawRoundFrame(painter, r, 
00531                     lw, colorGroup(), false);
00532 #else
00533                 QwtPainter::drawRoundFrame(painter, r, 
00534                     lw, palette(), false);
00535 #endif
00536                 break;
00537             case QwtDial::Sunken:
00538 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00539                 QwtPainter::drawRoundFrame(painter, r, 
00540                     lw, colorGroup(), true);
00541 #else
00542                 QwtPainter::drawRoundFrame(painter, r, 
00543                     lw, palette(), true);
00544 #endif
00545                 break;
00546             default: // Plain
00547             {
00548                 painter->save();
00549                 painter->setPen(QPen(Qt::black, lw));
00550                 painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
00551                 painter->drawEllipse(r);
00552                 painter->restore();
00553             }
00554         }
00555     }
00556 }
00557 
00569 void QwtDial::drawContents(QPainter *painter) const
00570 {
00571 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00572     if ( backgroundMode() == Qt::NoBackground || 
00573         colorGroup().brush(QColorGroup::Base) != 
00574             colorGroup().brush(QColorGroup::Background) )
00575 #else
00576     if ( testAttribute(Qt::WA_NoSystemBackground) ||
00577         palette().brush(QPalette::Base) != 
00578             palette().brush(QPalette::Background) )
00579 #endif
00580     {
00581 
00582         const QRect br = boundingRect();
00583 
00584         painter->save();
00585         painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
00586 
00587 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00588         painter->setBrush(colorGroup().brush(QColorGroup::Base));
00589 #else
00590         painter->setBrush(palette().brush(QPalette::Base));
00591 #endif
00592 
00593         painter->drawEllipse(br);
00594         painter->restore();
00595     }
00596 
00597 
00598     const QRect insideScaleRect = scaleContentsRect();
00599 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00600     if ( colorGroup().brush(QColorGroup::Foreground) !=
00601         colorGroup().brush(QColorGroup::Base) )
00602 #else
00603     if ( palette().brush(QPalette::Foreground) !=
00604         palette().brush(QPalette::Base) )
00605 #endif
00606     {
00607         painter->save();
00608         painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
00609 
00610 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00611         painter->setBrush(colorGroup().brush(QColorGroup::Foreground));
00612 #else
00613         painter->setBrush(palette().brush(QPalette::Foreground));
00614 #endif
00615 
00616         painter->drawEllipse(insideScaleRect.x() - 1, insideScaleRect.y() - 1,
00617             insideScaleRect.width(), insideScaleRect.height() );
00618 
00619         painter->restore();
00620     }
00621 
00622     const QPoint center = insideScaleRect.center();
00623     const int radius = insideScaleRect.width() / 2;
00624 
00625     painter->save();
00626     drawScaleContents(painter, center, radius);
00627     painter->restore();
00628 
00629     double direction = d_data->origin;
00630 
00631     if (isValid())
00632     {
00633         direction = d_data->origin + d_data->minScaleArc;
00634         if ( maxValue() > minValue() && d_data->maxScaleArc > d_data->minScaleArc )
00635         {
00636             const double ratio = 
00637                 (value() - minValue()) / (maxValue() - minValue());
00638             direction += ratio * (d_data->maxScaleArc - d_data->minScaleArc);
00639         }
00640 
00641         if ( direction >= 360.0 )
00642             direction -= 360.0;
00643     }
00644 
00645     double origin = d_data->origin;
00646     if ( mode() == RotateScale )
00647     {
00648         origin -= direction - d_data->origin;
00649         direction = d_data->origin;
00650     }
00651 
00652     painter->save();
00653     drawScale(painter, center, radius, origin, d_data->minScaleArc, d_data->maxScaleArc);
00654     painter->restore();
00655 
00656     if ( isValid() )
00657     {
00658         QPalette::ColorGroup cg;
00659         if ( isEnabled() )
00660             cg = hasFocus() ? QPalette::Active : QPalette::Inactive;
00661         else
00662             cg = QPalette::Disabled;
00663 
00664         painter->save();
00665         drawNeedle(painter, center, radius, direction, cg);
00666         painter->restore();
00667     }
00668 }
00669 
00682 void QwtDial::drawNeedle(QPainter *painter, const QPoint &center, 
00683     int radius, double direction, QPalette::ColorGroup cg) const
00684 {
00685     if ( d_data->needle )
00686     {
00687         direction = 360.0 - direction; // counter clockwise
00688         d_data->needle->draw(painter, center, radius, direction, cg);
00689     }
00690 }
00691 
00704 void QwtDial::drawScale(QPainter *painter, const QPoint &center,
00705     int radius, double origin, double minArc, double maxArc) const
00706 {
00707     if ( d_data->scaleDraw == NULL )
00708         return;
00709 
00710     origin -= 270.0; // hardcoded origin of QwtScaleDraw
00711 
00712     double angle = maxArc - minArc;
00713     if ( angle > 360.0 )
00714         angle = fmod(angle, 360.0);
00715 
00716     minArc += origin;
00717     if ( minArc < -360.0 )
00718         minArc = fmod(minArc, 360.0);
00719     
00720     maxArc = minArc + angle;
00721     if ( maxArc > 360.0 )
00722     {
00723         // QwtAbstractScaleDraw::setAngleRange accepts only values
00724         // in the range [-360.0..360.0]
00725         minArc -= 360.0;
00726         maxArc -= 360.0;
00727     }
00728     
00729     painter->setFont(font());
00730 
00731     d_data->scaleDraw->setAngleRange(minArc, maxArc);
00732     d_data->scaleDraw->setRadius(radius);
00733     d_data->scaleDraw->moveCenter(center);
00734 
00735 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00736     QColorGroup cg = colorGroup();
00737 
00738     const QColor textColor = cg.color(QColorGroup::Text);
00739     cg.setColor(QColorGroup::Foreground, textColor);
00740     painter->setPen(QPen(textColor, d_data->scaleDraw->penWidth()));
00741     
00742     d_data->scaleDraw->draw(painter, cg);
00743 #else
00744     QPalette pal = palette();
00745 
00746     const QColor textColor = pal.color(QPalette::Text);
00747     pal.setColor(QPalette::Foreground, textColor); //ticks, backbone
00748     
00749     painter->setPen(QPen(textColor, d_data->scaleDraw->penWidth()));
00750 
00751     d_data->scaleDraw->draw(painter, pal);
00752 #endif
00753 }
00754

00757 {
00758     // empty default implementation
00759 }

00779         update();
00780     }

00802 void QwtDial::rangeChange()
00803 {
00804     updateScale();
00805 }
00806 
00811 void QwtDial::updateScale()
00812 {
00813     if ( d_data->scaleDraw )
00814     {
00815         QwtLinearScaleEngine scaleEngine;
00816 
00817         const QwtScaleDiv scaleDiv = scaleEngine.divideScale(
00818             minValue(), maxValue(), 
00819             d_data->maxMajIntv, d_data->maxMinIntv, d_data->scaleStep);
00820 
00821         d_data->scaleDraw->setTransformation(scaleEngine.transformation());
00822         d_data->scaleDraw->setScaleDiv(scaleDiv);
00823     }
00824 }
00825 
00827 QwtDialScaleDraw *QwtDial::scaleDraw() 
00828 { 
00829     return d_data->scaleDraw; 
00830 }
00831 
00833 const QwtDialScaleDraw *QwtDial::scaleDraw() const 
00834 { 
00835     return d_data->scaleDraw; 
00836 }
00837 
00843 void QwtDial::setScaleDraw(QwtDialScaleDraw *scaleDraw)
00844 {
00845     if ( scaleDraw != d_data->scaleDraw )
00846     {
00847         if ( d_data->scaleDraw )
00848             delete d_data->scaleDraw;
00849     
00850         d_data->scaleDraw = scaleDraw;
00851         updateScale();
00852         update();
00853     }
00854 }
00855 
00860 void QwtDial::setScale(int maxMajIntv, int maxMinIntv, double step)
00861 {
00862     d_data->maxMajIntv = maxMajIntv;
00863     d_data->maxMinIntv = maxMinIntv;
00864     d_data->scaleStep = step;
00865 
00866     updateScale();
00867 }
00868 
00883 void QwtDial::setScaleOptions(int options)
00884 {
00885     if ( options == 0 )
00886         setScaleDraw(NULL);
00887 
00888     QwtDialScaleDraw *sd = d_data->scaleDraw;
00889     if ( sd == NULL )
00890         return;
00891 
00892     sd->enableComponent(QwtAbstractScaleDraw::Backbone, 
00893         options & ScaleBackbone);
00894 
00895     sd->enableComponent(QwtAbstractScaleDraw::Ticks, 
00896         options & ScaleTicks);
00897     
00898     sd->enableComponent(QwtAbstractScaleDraw::Labels, 
00899         options & ScaleLabel);
00900 }
00901 
00903 void QwtDial::setScaleTicks(int minLen, int medLen, 
00904     int majLen, int penWidth)
00905 {
00906     QwtDialScaleDraw *sd = d_data->scaleDraw;
00907     if ( sd )
00908     {
00909         sd->setTickLength(QwtScaleDiv::MinorTick, minLen);
00910         sd->setTickLength(QwtScaleDiv::MediumTick, medLen);
00911         sd->setTickLength(QwtScaleDiv::MajorTick, majLen);
00912         sd->setPenWidth(penWidth);
00913     }
00914 }

00919 QwtText QwtDial::scaleLabel(double value) const
00920 {
00921 #if 1

00923         value = 0;
00924 #endif
00925 
00926     return QString::number(value);
00927 }

00965 
00972 void QwtDial::setScaleArc(double minArc, double maxArc)
00973 {
00974     if ( minArc != 360.0 && minArc != -360.0 )
00975         minArc = fmod(minArc, 360.0);
00976     if ( maxArc != 360.0 && maxArc != -360.0 )
00977         maxArc = fmod(maxArc, 360.0);
00978 
00979     d_data->minScaleArc = qwtMin(minArc, maxArc);
00980     d_data->maxScaleArc = qwtMax(minArc, maxArc);
00981     if ( d_data->maxScaleArc - d_data->minScaleArc > 360.0 )
00982         d_data->maxScaleArc = d_data->minScaleArc + 360.0;
00983     
00984     update();
00985 }
00986 
00988 void QwtDial::valueChange()
00989 {
00990     update();
00991     QwtAbstractSlider::valueChange();
00992 }
00993 
00997 QSize QwtDial::sizeHint() const
00998 {
00999     int sh = 0;
01000     if ( d_data->scaleDraw )
01001         sh = d_data->scaleDraw->extent( QPen(), font() );
01002 
01003     const int d = 6 * sh + 2 * lineWidth();
01004     
01005     return QSize( d, d );
01006 }
01007 
01013 QSize QwtDial::minimumSizeHint() const
01014 {   
01015     int sh = 0;
01016     if ( d_data->scaleDraw )
01017         sh = d_data->scaleDraw->extent(QPen(), font() );
01018 
01019     const int d = 3 * sh + 2 * lineWidth();
01020     
01021     return QSize( d, d );
01022 }
01023 
01024 static double line2Radians(const QPoint &p1, const QPoint &p2)
01025 {
01026     const QPoint p = p2 - p1;
01027 
01028     double angle;
01029     if ( p.x() == 0 )
01030         angle = ( p.y() <= 0 ) ? M_PI_2 : 3 * M_PI_2;
01031     else
01032     {
01033         angle = atan(double(-p.y()) / double(p.x()));
01034         if ( p.x() < 0 )
01035             angle += M_PI;
01036         if ( angle < 0.0 )
01037             angle += 2 * M_PI;
01038     }
01039     return 360.0 - angle * 180.0 / M_PI;
01040 }
01041 
01048 double QwtDial::getValue(const QPoint &pos)
01049 {
01050     if ( d_data->maxScaleArc == d_data->minScaleArc || maxValue() == minValue() )
01051         return minValue();
01052 
01053     double dir = line2Radians(rect().center(), pos) - d_data->origin;
01054     if ( dir < 0.0 )
01055         dir += 360.0;
01056 
01057     if ( mode() == RotateScale )
01058         dir = 360.0 - dir;
01059 
01060     // The position might be in the area that is outside the scale arc.
01061     // We need the range of the scale if it was a complete circle.
01062 
01063     const double completeCircle = 360.0 / (d_data->maxScaleArc - d_data->minScaleArc) 
01064         * (maxValue() - minValue());
01065 
01066     double posValue = minValue() + completeCircle * dir / 360.0;
01067 
01068     if ( scrollMode() == ScrMouse )
01069     {
01070         if ( d_data->previousDir >= 0.0 ) // valid direction
01071         {
01072             // We have to find out whether the mouse is moving
01073             // clock or counter clockwise
01074 
01075             bool clockWise = false;
01076 
01077             const double angle = dir - d_data->previousDir;
01078             if ( (angle >= 0.0 && angle <= 180.0) || angle < -180.0 )
01079                 clockWise = true;
01080 
01081             if ( clockWise )
01082             {
01083                 if ( dir < d_data->previousDir && mouseOffset() > 0.0 )
01084                 {
01085                     // We passed 360 -> 0
01086                     setMouseOffset(mouseOffset() - completeCircle);
01087                 }
01088 
01089                 if ( wrapping() )
01090                 {
01091                     if ( posValue - mouseOffset() > maxValue() )
01092                     {
01093                         // We passed maxValue and the value will be set
01094                         // to minValue. We have to adjust the mouseOffset.
01095 
01096                         setMouseOffset(posValue - minValue());
01097                     }
01098                 }
01099                 else
01100                 {
01101                     if ( posValue - mouseOffset() > maxValue() ||
01102                         value() == maxValue() )
01103                     {
01104                         // We fix the value at maxValue by adjusting
01105                         // the mouse offset.
01106 
01107                         setMouseOffset(posValue - maxValue());
01108                     }
01109                 }
01110             }
01111             else
01112             {
01113                 if ( dir > d_data->previousDir && mouseOffset() < 0.0 )
01114                 {
01115                     // We passed 0 -> 360 
01116                     setMouseOffset(mouseOffset() + completeCircle);    
01117                 }
01118 
01119                 if ( wrapping() )
01120                 {
01121                     if ( posValue - mouseOffset() < minValue() )
01122                     {
01123                         // We passed minValue and the value will be set
01124                         // to maxValue. We have to adjust the mouseOffset.
01125 
01126                         setMouseOffset(posValue - maxValue());
01127                     }
01128                 }
01129                 else
01130                 {
01131                     if ( posValue - mouseOffset() < minValue() ||
01132                         value() == minValue() )
01133                     {
01134                         // We fix the value at minValue by adjusting
01135                         // the mouse offset.
01136 
01137                         setMouseOffset(posValue - minValue());
01138                     }
01139                 }
01140             }
01141         }
01142         d_data->previousDir = dir;
01143     }
01144 
01145     return posValue;
01146 }
01147 
01151 void QwtDial::getScrollMode(const QPoint &p, int &scrollMode, int &direction)
01152 {
01153     direction = 0;
01154     scrollMode = ScrNone;
01155 
01156     const QRegion region(contentsRect(), QRegion::Ellipse);
01157     if ( region.contains(p) && p != rect().center() )
01158     {
01159         scrollMode = ScrMouse;
01160         d_data->previousDir = -1.0;
01161     }
01162 }
01163 
01183 void QwtDial::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *e)
01184 {
01185     if ( isReadOnly() )
01186     {
01187         e->ignore();
01188         return;
01189     }
01190 
01191     if ( !isValid() )
01192         return;
01193 
01194     double previous = prevValue();
01195     switch ( e->key() )
01196     {
01197         case Qt::Key_Down:
01198         case Qt::Key_Left:
01199             QwtDoubleRange::incValue(-1);
01200             break;
01201 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
01202         case Qt::Key_Prior:
01203 #else
01204         case Qt::Key_PageUp:
01205 #endif
01206             QwtDoubleRange::incValue(-pageSize());
01207             break;
01208         case Qt::Key_Home:
01209             setValue(minValue());
01210             break;
01211 
01212         case Qt::Key_Up:
01213         case Qt::Key_Right:
01214             QwtDoubleRange::incValue(1);
01215             break;
01216 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
01217         case Qt::Key_Next:
01218 #else
01219         case Qt::Key_PageDown:
01220 #endif
01221             QwtDoubleRange::incValue(pageSize());
01222             break;
01223         case Qt::Key_End:
01224             setValue(maxValue());
01225             break;
01226         default:;
01227             e->ignore();
01228     }
01229 
01230     if (value() != previous)
01231         emit sliderMoved(value());
01232 }
01233 
01234 void QwtDial::updateMask()
01235 {
01236     if ( d_data->visibleBackground )
01237         clearMask();
01238     else
01239         setMask(QRegion(boundingRect(), QRegion::Ellipse));
01240 }
